definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
meticulous/(of domestic animals or fowls) young

sentences.chinese: 穿牛仔褲的人均未準進入。

sentences.english: Blue jeans and a yellow T-shirt.
Denim is a strong usually blue cotton cloth that is used especially to make jeans.
sentences.chinese: “丹寧布”是用來做牛仔褲的藍色棉布。

sentences.english: I wish I could invent something like bluejeans.
sentences.chinese: 我真希望自己能發明像牛仔褲這樣的東西。

sentences.english: Jeans with flared legs are popular this year.
sentences.chinese: 牛仔褲是喇叭口的款式，今年很流行。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, steer clear of tapered leg openings or a wide bell-bottomed look.
sentences.chinese: 同時，不要穿錐形或寬腿喇叭型的牛仔褲。

sentences.english: Today, jeans come in many colors, styles and prices.
sentences.chinese: 今天，牛仔褲有很多色澤，款式和價格任你挑選。

sentences.english: I only buy my jeans at Goodwill.
sentences.chinese: 我只買我的牛仔褲在善意。

sentences.english: For ladies you will find jeans, tops, dresses, undergarments and fragrances.
sentences.chinese: 對於女人你會發現牛仔褲，上衣，服裝，內衣和香水。

sentences.english: Hip, edgy jeans make him think you're too cool for school.
sentences.chinese: 低腰的窄腳牛仔褲會讓他覺得你太過前衛。

sentences.english: A pari of jeans and a T - shirt seem to the nearest thing to a global fashion.
sentences.chinese: 一件T恤加一條牛仔褲幾乎是全球的時尚。

sentences.english: She was putting on her jeans while asking me to hand her the sweater.
sentences.chinese: 她邊穿牛仔褲，邊讓我把毛衣遞給她。

sentences.english: Cut the legs off your jeans and cut them open along the inside seam. Lay them flat on the table.
sentences.chinese: 將牛仔褲的褲腿剪下，沿褲縫線剪開，平放在桌子上。

sentences.english: Jeans have continued to evolve with our ever-changing fashion world.
sentences.chinese: 牛仔褲繼續發展，我們不斷變化的時尚世界。

sentences.english: Yeah I love scuffed up cowboy boots and broken tore up jeans.
sentences.chinese: 是的我愛穿磨損牛仔靴破洞襤褸牛仔褲。

sentences.english: Usually the burnouts dress in jeans and wear the black rock-concert.
sentences.chinese: 吸毒族一般穿牛仔褲，黑色搖滾樂T恤。
